titles.title: Volunteer Organization Safety Act of 1999
To eliminate the requirement that fingerprints be supplied for background checks on volunteers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 11/16/1999--Introduced. Volunteer Organization Safety Act of 1999 - Prohibits the Federal Government from requiring an entity requesting a State and Federal criminal history check of a volunteer worker through the national criminal history background check system to supply the fingerprints of that volunteer worker.
